channel.title: ShopHandler Error?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h433/pure_k2/Servererrorconfusion.png[/img]
Can someone help me fix this? Because I don't understand why it's giving me this, I literally didn't edit anything in the shophandler I just left it alone and it all of a sudden gave me this error when running? :\

item.title: ShopHandler Error?
item.dc:creator: @k2_k0 k2 k0
item.description:
@k2_k0 wrote:

The Soul:

Did you use spaces rather than tabs in the configuration file?

What ever it was, It had to do with the config file maybe because the shop wasn’t being used in anything? I just put it in there for when it was time to make the shop but I suppose that was it? Because it fixed it so thank you very much sir! saved me big time with something so simple!

Read full topic

item.title: ShopHandler Error?

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Did you use spaces rather than tabs in the configuration file?
